object.name: editUserStarSubscription
object.description: Allows the bot to cancel or re-enable extension of a subscription paid in Telegram Stars. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Allows the bot to cancel or re-enable extension of a subscription paid in Telegram Stars. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Allows the bot to cancel or re-enable extension of a subscription paid in Telegram Stars. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Identifier of the user whose subscription will be edited
annotations.html_description: Identifier of the user whose subscription will be edited
annotations.rst_description: Identifier of the user whose subscription will be edited
annotations.name: user_id

annotations.description: Telegram payment identifier for the subscription
annotations.rst_description: Telegram payment identifier for the subscription
annotations.name: telegram_payment_charge_id

annotations.description: Pass True to cancel extension of the user subscription; the subscription must be active up to the end of the current subscription period. Pass False to allow the user to re-enable a subscription that was previously canceled by the bot.
annotations.html_description: Pass True to cancel extension of the user subscription; the subscription must be active up to the end of the current subscription period. Pass False to allow the user to re-enable a subscription that was previously canceled by the bot.
annotations.rst_description: Pass :code:`True` to cancel extension of the user subscription; the subscription must be active up to the end of the current subscription period. Pass :code:`False` to allow the user to re-enable a subscription that was previously canceled by the bot.
annotations.name: is_canceled
